branchCategory.name: FGD, Low Flow Rate Industrial Filter, Vessel Series
branchCategory.description: <p>Suitable for low flow rate and low pressure filtration, the FGD industrial filter series can be used with a wide range of fluids.  Two models, the FGDE and FGDF have antistatic specifications.</p>

breadCrumb.name: FGD, Low Flow Rate Industrial Filter, Vessel Series
